title: Fully Renovated, Spacious Studio, Huge Walk In Closet, Courtyard View
posting_body: Welcome to City GateDiscover something new and exciting at City Gate Denver.
Conveniently located in the heart of the River North Art District, just minutes from Downtown Denver and Lodo, you will find yourself at the gateway to urban living.
Easily walk to a Rockies baseball game at Coors Field, stroll the streets and appreciate the art of RiNo, or simply stay at home and enjoy a variety of fabulous amenities.
Whatever you are looking for our apartment homes here at City Gate are fit to elevate your lifestyle inside and out.

We offer elevated rental living with a variety of spacious studio, one and two-bedroom flats and loft units with comfortable features and modern interior finishes including plank wood flooring and granite kitchen countertops.
Live a city lifestyle without sacrificing comfort.
City Gate apartments offer many amenities outside your apartment home including a resort-inspired pool area with lounge areas, clubhouse with meeting or work areas.
Your pet will feel right at home with our pet friendly features including a fenced dog park and easy access to several dog parks.
City Gate puts a vibrant urban lifestyle at your doorstep, from microbreweries to trendy bars and foodie eateries.
Easily explore Denver’s nightlife or stroll along Larimer Street and take in the eclectic shops and art galleries.
Take advantage of Denver’s 300 days of sunshine, grab your bike or running shoes and explore the 11.5 miles of the South Platte River Trail anytime you feel the urge to enjoy nature.
Flex splits up your rent into smaller, stress free payments throughout the month.
Pet Friendly Community with Dog Park
Fitness Center with Cardio and Free Weights
Ski and Bike Storage and Repair Area
Close to Restaurants, Shopping, Parks and More!
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
